message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about we meet at $110?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. How about we meet at $108?
I'm close to your price, but I'd like to get it down to $107. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm getting close to giving in, but I still need a bit more. How about we meet at $109?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to get it down to $106. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, but I'll try one more time. How about we meet at $108?
This is my final offer. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
